titles.title: To authorize the Secretary of Veterans Affairs to carry out a major medical facility project in Atlanta, Georgia.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.

bill.summary:
11/9/2007--Introduced.
Authorizes the Secretary of Veterans Affairs to carry out a major medical facility project for the modernization of inpatient wards at the Department of Veterans Affairs Medical Center, Atlanta, Georgia.
